title: Florida Testing Disruptions Caused by Foreign Hackers - Education Week
text:
Florida Testing Disruptions Caused by Foreign Hackers News in Brief Florida Testing Disruptions Caused by Foreign Hackers 
A cyberattack that disrupted Florida's statewide exams was vast, but the culprits are "likely based somewhere outside the United States," and law-enforcement officials said last week that they have closed their six-month investigation without suspects or a motive. 
In a summary, state education officials said that no student information was compromised, and measures installed to thwart ...
